Twister/Blizzard



*Twister follows Sinesis towards the Predacon Base*


*=
Blizzard walks next to Sinister towards the Maximal Base*

  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday=
, August 05, 2000 8:56 PM
  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


  Sin=
esis walks toward the Predacon base. Sinister walks toward the Maximal base=
...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 8:44 PM
    Subject: =
Re: The End is Near...........


    Twister/Blizzard


    Twister: We'll =
never know until we try!

    *Twister says to Sinesis*

    Twister: Which=
 way to his base?

    *Twister asks Sinesis*




    *Blizzard holds Sinis=
ter's hand starts walking towards the Maximal Base*

      ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent=
: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:48 PM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near.....=
......


      "Partner's!" Sinesis says. He starts to think.

      "Think=
 Rampage will want us on his side?" Sinesis asks Twister.

      Sinister s=
tarts toward the Maximal base while holding Blizzard's hand...
        ----=
- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:38 PM
        Subje=
ct: Re: The End is Near...........


        Blizzard/Twister


        *Bl=
izzard sighs and keeps walking but looks behind her and than doesn't anymor=
e*



        Twister: Your right. It's not like she was going to let me st=
ay anyway.

        *Twister stands up*

        Twister: I think we start =
looking now. The sooner the better. Partners?

        *Twister says to Sin=
esis while holding her fist out for him to hit his on*

          ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:33 PM
          Subject: R=
e: The End is Near...........


          Sinister listens carefully to the=
 words of Blizzard.

          "Who needs a home, Twister!? Let's just go f=
ind another team that wants us and we shall be on our way to glory!" Sinesi=
s said to Twister...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent=
: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:02 AM
            Subject: Re: The End is Nea=
r...........


            Blizzard/Twister


            *Blizzard begins =
walking*

            Blizzard:..Who am I kidding...I don't know what to do=
, I probably eat myself!

            *Blizzard says sadly*

            Bl=
izzard: It seems the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even my =
sister. I know the way she was acting, not normal.

            *Blizzard s=
ays to Sinister and sighs and continues walking*



            *Twister lo=
oks at Sinesis*

            Twister: It was up to me tell the others too b=
ut I didn't because I didn't do it before I tried to stop Retroflame and I =
didn't after because I was too concerned with saving myself....That was the=
 past and the future can be different but it isn't looking up now that we h=
ave no home...

            *Twister says to Sinesis

              ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
      =
        Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


              "Okay." Sin=
ister said lamely. He walked off with Blizzard whenever Blizzard walks off.=


              Sinesis sighs.
               
              "I always said=
 I never made any mistakes. That I was perfect, but once, I was supposed to=
 fight some criminals that had a bounty on them, but I was not to harm anyo=
ne else. I killed that criminal for my own selfish needs, but he had a time=
 bomb set. I thoguht I could disarm it, but all I did was set the time even=
 lower, and some bots didn't have time to get away. I managed to get away s=
ince I knew about it, but I never told them, so that's why I chose the evil=
 path in life, I felt I had done something evil..." Sinesis said...
       =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizard=
s 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, =
August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
                Subject: Re: The End is Near.......=
....


                Twister/Blizzard


                Twister: I was se=
nt on a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame. She planed to blow up=
 some other bots that didn't know a thing because she claimed that they wer=
e in her way. I was given no partners for there were none to give. I didn't=
 stop them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped in a pod thinking of o=
nly myself and other bots were killed not only because of Retroflame but al=
so because of me....I deserved to be near that bomb.....There were missions=
 before that but I wish not speak of for I have failed too many.......I wou=
ldn't kill myself for I would probably be sent back down for the Matrix wou=
ld not want my selfish kind in.......

                *Twister says to Sin=
esis*


                *Blizzard sighs and looks up again still frowning*
=

                Blizzard: We need to find shelter, my love.

             =
   *Blizzard says to Sinister*

                  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
                  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
            =
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


                  Sinesis w=
alks to Twister.

                  "A failure? When were you a failure? Te=
ll me of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis s=
aid. Sinister shook his head.

                  "Unbelievable." Sinister s=
aid. Stronghold and Blender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and=
 Dracona's misfortune and take a smoke, then walk off to find another side =
to join, all the time hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister re=
ally is and always will be a failure...
                    ----- Original =
Message ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
                 =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2=
000 3:22 AM
                    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


 =
                   Twister/Blizzard


                    *Twister looks at=
 what was left of the base*

                    Twister: I always be nothi=
ng but a failer with nowhere to go...

                    *Twister walks n=
ext to the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


          =
          *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

        =
            Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can actually c=
all home.....

                    *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

  =
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                      Fro=
m: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
     Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
                      Subject:=
 The End is Near...........


                      Dracona looked into the=
 pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and walked back toward her ba=
se. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun around and grabbed the dagg=
er in pain. Plintissa stood there.

                      "You do not know =
when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to =
grind you so small you won't be able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracona=
 said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. It missed Plint=
issa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa t=
ackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again turned to her saw blade=
 to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dr=
acona started to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids it=
. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her b=
ad life that she discovered her true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracona=
 mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a si=
mple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and sliced the sti=
ck to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. P=
lintissa fell.

                      "Th weak move aside and die so the st=
rong can survive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has always been the way of=
 things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend, but don't take this p=
ersonally, it's just business." Dracona said.
                       
     =
                 Dracona pulled back the saw blade and thrust it towards Pl=
intissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and threw it. It hit Dracon=
a's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as she did, the blade cam=
e loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracona blinked her eye=
, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived on the planet. The blad=
e sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces everywhere. Her spark exting=
uished. Her last words were:

                      "*Cough, Cough* Zardus =
I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Dracona died smilin=
g. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she would never leav=
e her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got w=
eaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, t=
oo.

                      "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plin=
tissa whispered.

                      "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa?=
 Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

                      "Artist=
, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part, she really was m=
y friend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished spark as it tried=
 to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

                      "Plintis=
sa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my friends are=
 gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

                      "Your=
 helping days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said=
.

                      "This isn't some lame thing about how you'll alway=
s be in my heart, is it?"

                      "No, Artist, come here." P=
lintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team Ultima's base. It was destroyed, =
the funny thing was, that it was destroyed by Dracona, the very one, along =
with Plintissa, that originally built it. And there it was, sticking above =
ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks at the base and sighs.

        =
              "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have to leave." Sinesis=
 says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

                      "=
Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

       =
               Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst fr=
om her and floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed to d=
o. He opened his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist combi=
ned Plintissa's spark with his own, they became one.

                     =
 "Till all are one." Artist whispered really low. Plintissa told him she st=
ill loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now th=
ey could never be seperated again. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard and=
 Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a field.

                =
      "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa said=
. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward the M=
aximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attack a=
nyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up th=
e contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

                      "I love y=
ou." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

                      "I love you to=
o." Plintissa said to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base.=
..
